item.title: Mobile App Best Practices (and Why Mobile Doesn't Always Win)
item.description: <p>Not having a mobile website in 2014 sounds archaic, but for many site owners, itâ€™s really good business sense.</p> <img src="http://www.google-analytics.com/collect?v=1&tid=UA-38685832-1&cid=55555&t=pageview&dp=%2Frss%2Fmobile-app-best-practices">
